achievements.name: Multi-Agent Fleet
achievements.description: Create 3+ different agents

achievements.name: Agent Army
achievements.description: Create 5+ different agents

achievements.name: Model Mixer
achievements.description: Create agents using different Claude models

detection.trigger: Claude detects multiple agents with different model specifications (e.g., opus, sonnet, haiku)

achievements.name: Budget Optimizer
achievements.description: Create agent using Haiku for cost efficiency

achievements.name: Power Agent
achievements.description: Create agent using Opus for maximum capability

achievements.name: Agent Orchestrator
achievements.description: Reference another agent in agent prompt

achievements.name: Security Agent
achievements.description: Create agent focused on security tasks

achievements.name: Test Agent
achievements.description: Create agent specialized for testing

achievements.name: Docs Agent
achievements.description: Create agent for documentation tasks

achievements.name: Sandboxed Agent
achievements.description: Create agent with restricted tool access for safety

achievements.name: Pre-Commit Hook
achievements.description: Set up hook triggered before commits

achievements.name: Logging Hook
achievements.description: Create hook that logs tool usage

achievements.name: Validation Hook
achievements.description: Create hook that validates input or output

achievements.name: Transformation Hook
achievements.description: Hook that transforms tool input or output

achievements.name: Notification System
achievements.description: Hook that sends desktop or external notifications

achievements.name: Metrics Collector
achievements.description: Hook that tracks and stores metrics

achievements.name: Bash Hook
achievements.description: Create hook that watches Bash tool specifically

achievements.name: File Guardian
achievements.description: Hook that protects certain files from modification

achievements.name: Hook Scripter
achievements.description: Create hook that runs an external script

achievements.name: Conditional Hook
achievements.description: Hook with conditional logic based on environment

achievements.name: Auto Committer
achievements.description: Use Claude to automatically create git commits

detection.trigger: User asks Claude to commit changes or uses /commit command

achievements.name: PR Generator
achievements.description: Use Claude to create a pull request

detection.trigger: User asks Claude to create PR or uses gh pr create

achievements.name: Branch Manager
achievements.description: Use Claude to manage git branches

detection.trigger: User asks Claude to create, switch, or delete branches

achievements.name: Headless Operator
achievements.description: Run Claude Code in non-interactive mode

detection.trigger: User runs claude with -p/--print flag or pipes input

achievements.name: Pipeline Builder
achievements.description: Chain Claude output to other commands

detection.trigger: User pipes Claude output to another process

achievements.name: CI Integrator
achievements.description: Use Claude in CI/CD pipeline

achievements.name: GitHub Action User
achievements.description: Use Claude Code GitHub Action

achievements.name: Changelog Generator
achievements.description: Use Claude to generate changelogs

detection.trigger: User asks Claude to generate or update CHANGELOG

achievements.name: Release Automator
achievements.description: Use Claude to prepare releases

detection.trigger: User asks Claude to create release, bump version, or tag

achievements.name: Issue Handler
achievements.description: Use Claude to manage GitHub issues

detection.trigger: User uses gh issue commands through Claude

achievements.name: Code Reviewer
achievements.description: Use Claude to review pull requests

detection.trigger: User asks Claude to review PR or uses /review-pr command

achievements.name: Test Runner
achievements.description: Use Claude to run and interpret test results

detection.trigger: User asks Claude to run tests (pytest, jest, etc.)

achievements.name: Test Fixer
achievements.description: Let Claude fix failing tests automatically

detection.trigger: User asks Claude to fix failing tests

achievements.name: Lint Automator
achievements.description: Use Claude to fix linting issues

detection.trigger: User asks Claude to fix ESLint, Prettier, or other linting errors

achievements.name: Dependency Updater
achievements.description: Use Claude to update project dependencies

detection.trigger: User asks Claude to update npm/pip/cargo dependencies

achievements.name: Migration Assistant
achievements.description: Use Claude for database or code migrations

detection.trigger: User asks Claude to create or run migrations

achievements.name: Scaffold Master
achievements.description: Use Claude to generate boilerplate code

detection.trigger: User asks Claude to scaffold/bootstrap/init new components

achievements.name: Batch Processor
achievements.description: Use Claude to process multiple files at once

detection.trigger: User asks Claude to modify/process multiple files

achievements.name: Refactor Ranger
achievements.description: Use Claude for large-scale refactoring

detection.trigger: User asks Claude to refactor code across multiple files

achievements.name: Codemod Creator
achievements.description: Create reusable code transformation scripts

detection.trigger: User creates codemod/ast-grep/jscodeshift scripts with Claude
